mean_cn: n.承诺，许诺；承担的义务；赞助；委托
mean_en: a promise to do something or to behave in a particular way; a promise to support somebody/something; the fact of committing yourself
sentence: They made a commitment to each other at their wedding ceremony.
sentence_trans: 在婚礼上，他们相互做出承诺。
word_etyma: commit承诺 + ment名词后缀 → commitment承诺
